channel.title: Blurry screen after loading saved game
channel.description: The screens all blurry after i load my saved game. I have cheats on and i was in god mode. So everything looks blurry as if i was wearing glasses, except for the health and menus. I can't play the game because now freeman's ecentuly blind. WHAT DO I DO!?

You might want to start looking at the post dates. This question was asked back in July of 2013.

item.title: Blurry screen after loading saved game

item.description:
Provide a screenshot maybe and someone can help you? Is it blurry as in “Looks like Gordon got his glasses knocked off” or a weird effect?
